ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is certainly in the earlier texts,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is surely in the earlier Books,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This, indeed, was in the ancient Scrolls,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is what is written in the ancient heavenly Books,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed this is in the former scriptures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, this is in the former Scriptures
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely this is in the earlier scriptures,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely this is in the ancient scrolls,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! This is in the former scrolls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This indeed is what is taught in the former scriptures --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily this is in Writs ancient
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is indeed in the former scriptures,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And this is in the Books of the earliest (Revelation),-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! This is in the former Scriptures,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely, this is in the ancient Scrolls,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is in the former scriptures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [87:18] Truly this, the success of those who purify themselves, and the Hereafter being better, is in the former scrolls, the ones revealed before the Qur’ān,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Lo! This) from His saying: (He is Successful) up to here (is in the former scrolls) in the Scriptures of the people of old,
